title: Samples, 1938
medium:
Medium: silk, linen, synthetic fibers
Technique: printed on plain weave, crepe, novelty weaves; double cloth
description: Forty-nine samples of silk, linen and synthetic fiber fabrics. Seven are silk and synthetic fiber double cloths with woven designs. Forty-two are printed plain weave, crepe and novelty weaves. Bound at the top with cream paper-covered cardboard printed in brown: "Soieries E. Perrot. Mathew M. MacCarthy, Inc. New York." Stamped on reverse: "Made in France."

tombstone.epitaph:
Samples, 1938. Medium: silk, linen, synthetic fibers
Technique: printed on plain weave, crepe, novelty weaves; double cloth. 
Gift of William Hardy, Inc.. 1938-74-54
